name: mums pillow . peat
description:
the Japanese Festival of Happiness celebrates these beautiful flowers every fall . you can celebrate all year long with our handprinted pillow . we use a water-based ink, silkscreened by hand onto an organic cotton + hemp blended canvas . the pillow is filled with fluffy feather down and is removable with a hidden zipper closure for easy-peasy cleaning 

may be purchased with or without the stuffer

also available in lemon or poppi
size . 18 x 18

no shipping fee within the u.s.a.!

name: happy days calendar . loopi
description:
an original design screen-printed onto baltic birchwood creates a stylish backdrop for marking the days. at year’s end, elegant letterpress calendar pages give way to a captivating work of art — ready for display on its own, or for adding refill pages for the following year… making it an eco-happy choice as well!

2014 calendar year
size . 9" x 16"

free u.s shipping!!

name: pikku ribbon + paddle . NEW
description:
pony tails, presents and posies.. these are just three ways we can think of to use this beautiful cotton ribbon AND we've found a charming NEW way to store them with our wood ribbon paddles
2 yards of ribbon wrapped around a handmade wood paddle . the paddle is meant to be reused again and again to house more ribbon from your stash and looks ever so lovely hanging up .

a collaboration between angela liguori and pikku . 2cm wide 100% cotton ribbon imported from italy by angela liguori and silkscreen printed in three pikku patterns . 

ribbon paddles are handmade in vermont USA

name: kitchen mitt . loop-di-loop . NEW
description:
everything tastes better fresh from the oven.. so "get 'em while they're hot!" with this handy dandy kitchen mitt

this happy pattern is silkscreened by hand onto an organic cotton + hemp blended canvas . 100% natural cotton quilted lining 

one size

name: loop-di-loop pillow . straw
description:
we’re loopy for this cheerful pillow! silkscreened by hand onto an organic cotton + hemp blended canvas, this bright pattern adds a splash of color and comfort to your room . we use eco-friendly materials such as water-based inks and fluffy feather down . hidden zipper closure allows pillow to be removed for easy-peasy cleaning 

may be purchased with or without the stuffer

size . 18 x 18

no shipping fee within the u.s.a.!

name: tuulip pillow . tart
description:
silkscreened by hand onto an organic cotton + hemp blended canvas, these grinning flowers are sure to brighten any space
eco-friendly materials such as water-based inks and feather down are just another way to bring smiles into your home
hidden zipper closure allows pillow to be removed for easy-peasy cleaning 

may be purchased with or without the stuffer

name: rocking horse
description:

charming wood + metal vintage rocking horse with sweetly painted features and soft leather ears.. fine patina shows it was previously ridden with lots of love

name: patchqwirk . poppi

size . 4 7/8" x 3 1/2"
